text: Hello. Is there any way to remove the theme.json from a project?
I dont think so. Why are you trying to get rid of it? This is essentially how HubSpot knows what to call your project and what your project/theme is.
In some regards it is also like a config file for your project where you store your theme’s name and breakpoints etc
<@U7SL518D6>, appreciate the further explanation
Hi all, seems like signature v2 is actually broken in all accounts, at least for crm extensions
anyone experiencing the same or similar issue? what's the best method to open the issue to the devs?
Yes! We’re experiencing the same thing on our. No changes to our keys, but the signature heading is not validating.
<@UD53A9UUR> I’ve worked with you in the past re: creds for our app. Do you have any insight on this?
i was actually just informed that there has been a fix put in place for this.  I am waiting for more info on it, but it looks like that v2 signature should be working now
<@UAX5LJ9K3> FYI
if you all want to do me a favor and verify, i would be a happy kid :slightly_smiling_face:

Does anyone know if there is a way to use the |selectattr filter "containing" in such a way that is case insensitive? for example this is my code that is currently working ( it just requires it to match exactly).
```module.cards|selectattr('card_front.text','containing', request.query_dict['search-'+ name])```
I’m not sure I can get to that today, but I’ll try.
rich...
i pay you tons of money
:wink:
kidding (hopefully obviously).  No pressure on time.  you can just report back if it persists

Hi there, I'm new to using the Sandbox tool and I want to know if I can use the tool to build a website for a client that is using HubSpot CMS but wants to redesign their current website. Any resource you can share for once I finish the website how can transfer that to the client account and publish it?
Hi, I've got a question, Can we start building projects for HubSpot Hackathon or only during the time frame provided in Devpost?
